title: Howard Schultz
summary: Howard D. Schultz (born July 19, 1953)[2] is an American businessman and author. He served as the chairman and chief executive officer (CEO) of the Starbucks Coffee Company from 1986 to 2000, and then again from 2008 to 2017. Schultz also owned the Seattle SuperSonics basketball team from 2001 to 2006.
